ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
ygData.msgSnippet: In our 4-5 hrs (we had to wait for a very nice 30+ level to kill him one more time, then he watched over us breaking up the spawn, and left it to us), he
ygData.messageBody:
In our 4-5 hrs (we had to wait for a very nice 30+ level to kill him one
more time, then he watched over us breaking up the spawn, and left it to
us), he spawned 5 times.

For a group of 3-4 lvl 21's it was challenging to hold the room since it
is on the train tracks for certain areas. (If you cower in the corner,
the trains ignore you, but if you are fighting, its bad news). When we
weren't being trained, the cleric and wizard would go kill the large
spider, while the bard and cleric whelp the scryer room...
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
